Parameters: Context: A context to retrieve the Resources from.

int: The desired resource identifier of a @B_android#graphics#Typeface_E@, as generated by the aapt tool. This integer encodes the package, type, and resource entry. The value 0 is an invalid identifier.
Throws: Throws NotFoundException if the given ID does not exist.
getFont(android.content.Context, int).Description: Returns a font Typeface associated with a particular resource ID. Prior to API level 23, font resources with more than one font in a family will only load the first font in that family.
